name: Beyond The Aurum
description:
Are you ready?  Then just press DOWNLOAD (scary music)

Hey little adventurer, all the story is already in the game so I'm not gonna explain it here, try the game^^

In this game you control a little adventurer in a gold mine, you play the game only with the SPACE bar because the play keep moving on the right and you can press SPACE to jump and go faster!!! 

Are you enough fast to escape the collapsing mine in less than 60 seconds?

We will see^^
